bludit-license: Bludit is released under the MIT license
head-description: Bludit Pro is Bludit with extra remarkable plugins. Bludit Pro doesn't have to be purchased nor requires any special licensing to use it.
description-paragraph1: Bludit Pro is Bludit with extra remarkable plugins. Bludit Pro doesn't have to be purchased nor requires any special licensing to use it. You will receive the same great support for Bludit Pro as received for Bludit.
description-paragraph2: Bludit Pro is available to community members who have donated to the project. Donations and community support are what helps the project stay up and running. Support Bludit today by donating and enjoy all the great features of Bludit plus more with Bludit Pro!
donations-paragraph1: If you like Bludit and is useful for you, please consider donating to the project.
donations-paragraph2: Below, there are some links for differents platforms. Thank you!
paypal-paragraph2: Or send directly to my email account
payoneer-paragraph1: You can send the donation to my email or ask me for another alternative such as Global Bank Account.
skrill-paragraph1: Send the donation directly to my email account
bitcoins-paragraph1: You can send the donation to my Bitcoin Wallet Address
